neos_flow.title: Neos Flow Logfile
neos_flow.description: Log file format for Neos Flow (neos.io)

sample.line: 19-02-01 09:23:37 31547      DEBUG     Flow                 CSRF: No token required, safe request

19-02-01 09:23:37 31547      DEBUG     Flow                 No trans-unit element with the id "Google Analytics configuration" was found in resource://TYPO3.Neos/Private/Translations/en/Main.xlf. Either this translation has been removed or the id in the code or template referring to the translation is wrong.
19-02-01 09:50:28 40933      ERROR     MyPackage        No controller could be resolved which would match your request. Package key: "my.package", controller name: "example". (GET http://example.org)
